trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Riverbank
There were no other sightings in Riverbank on or around February 10th 2012
Summary: seemed to 'pop; into atmosphere, blinking 5 times, each time smaller, then powering down and reversing direction
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my hot tub between 5:30 and 6:30 am and i looked up, (as I often do) and saw this light 'blink' into what seemed to be our atmosphere blinking 5 times, each time getting smaller and closer, then the craft seemed to power down to a dull grey glow, reverse direction and head back toward where it came from, then disappeared. in regards to how I felt, I found the incedent interesting. And I would like to possibly learn more about what I saw, maybe ours? theirs? I dont know, but would like to.
